RT @foodpornista: Drink a glass of water before you eat. It will tell your brain that you are fuller quicker resulting in weight loss.
@foodpornista Maybe [cooked] porridge (low glycemic index)...others etc ?
@foodpornista We’ve got 'pressure sensors' in the wall of our stomachs that detect heavy foods (satiety https://t.co/7fk3KjOMk0).
@foodpornista a little more quickly (same with soups). Something 'heavy' in our stomachs gives us the lasting impression of being full.
